attributes.action: tell us why Sir Stuart Bell is considered to be the best man for the job when he considers that the information published yesterday, which deprives the taxpayer of information necessary to uncover fraudulent activity of elected MPs after he made the ludicrous statement that this revelation is a monumental step forward
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Does this not unequivocally prove that Sir Stuart is NOT his own man over this process and he is merely a yes man for the prime minister, already primed to ensure that what is stolen from the taxpayer in future by politicians is kept hidden.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
